title: CMMC Compliance & Enclave Services
intro: ValorForge delivers CMMC 2.0 Level 2 readiness with in your Tenant or ours, managed or not, via a Microsoft-powered enclave for Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI).

items.title: Enclave Launcher
items.body: One-time onboarding to stand up a secure, Level 2-aligned CUI enclave. Includes boundary definition, dataflow diagrams, asset inventory, Microsoft reference architecture (Entra ID, Intune, Defender, Purview, SharePoint/Teams restrictions), SSP skeleton, core policies/SOPs, and evidence room structure—ensuring anti-sprawl guardrails and clear shared responsibilities.

items.title: Evidence Ops as a Service
items.body: Ongoing managed operations producing audit-ready evidence as a byproduct of security cadences. Weekly alert triage and vuln reviews; monthly access/patch/log/backup attestations; quarterly IR tabletops and policy checks; automated/semi-automated exports, traceability matrix, and monthly evidence packs—plus micro-training, governance calls, and drift/change control.

items.title: Certify-Ready Handoff
items.body: Pre-assessment readiness checks, remediation plans, final SSP/policies, mapped evidence index, interview prep, live demo scripts, and boundary package. Includes introduction to 3–5 trusted C3PAOs for client-led assessment scheduling—ensuring predictable, fast certification without us acting as the assessor.
